text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va rasuli U imon ovardaed va amal ʙa sari'ati U dored! Vaqte dar rohi Alloh ʙa musofirat rafted, tahqiq kuned. Va ʙa kase, ki ʙa sumo ʙo salom (ja'ne, kalimai Lo iloha illalloh) murociat mekunad va ʙo sumo namecangad, ehtimol in ki mu'min ast, ki imonasro pinhon kardaast, nagued, ki tu mu'min nesti, to ʙa in tariq mato'i zindagonii dunjoro ʙicued. Pas nazdi Alloh ƣanimathoi zijode ast, ki sumo ham pes az in cunin ʙuded, dar iʙtidoi islom imoni xudro az musrikoni qavmaton pinhon medosted, vale Alloh ʙar sumo minnat nihod. Va sumoro ʙa imon va quvvat aziz gardond. Pas korhojatonro donista tahqiq kuned, hamono Alloh ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
